meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6790.

div.div: Battle of the Decades: The 1990s game 5.

td.p: Brad Rutter, an actor and producer from Hollywood, California
Mike Dupée, a post-graduate student from Gainesville, Florida
Jill Bunzendahl Chimka, a director of therapy from Washington, D.C.

tr.td: OPRAH'S BOOK CLUB
THE 2-DOORS
THE WORLD WIDE "WEB"
ALL SORTS OF SPORTS
HAIL TO THE CHEF

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
